00066 class AISDatabaseParser {
00067 private:
00070     enum ParseState {
00071     PARSER_START,
00072     PARSER_FINISH,
00073     AIS,
00074     ENTRY,
00075     PRIMARY,
00076     ANCILLARY,
00077     PARSER_UNKNOWN,
00078     PARSER_ERROR
00079     };
00080 
00094     struct AISParserState {
00095     ParseState state;   // current state
00096     ParseState prev_state;  // previous state
00097     int unknown_depth;  // handle recursive unknown tags
00098  
00099     string error_msg;   // Error message(s), if any.
00100 
00101     xmlParserCtxtPtr ctxt;  // used for error msg line numbers
00102     AISResources *ais;  // dump info here
00103 
00104     string primary;     // current entry's primary URL/Regexp
00105     bool regexp;        // True if primary is a regexp
00106 
00107     ResourceVector rv;  // add ancillary entries to rv
00108     };
00109     
00110 public:
00111     void intern(const string &database, AISResources *ais)
00112     throw(AISDatabaseReadFailed);
00113 
00114     static void aisStartDocument(AISParserState *state);
00115     static void aisEndDocument(AISParserState *state);
00116     static void aisStartElement(AISParserState *state, const char *name, 
00117                 const char **attrs);
00118     static void aisEndElement(AISParserState *state, const char *name);
00119     static xmlEntityPtr aisGetEntity(AISParserState *state,
00120                      const xmlChar *name);
00121     static void aisWarning(AISParserState *state, const char *msg, ...);
00122     static void aisError(AISParserState *state, const char *msg, ...);
00123     static void aisFatalError(AISParserState *state, const char *msg, ...);
00124 };
